WorkItem.ClosedComment: You mean the getReadDataOnly(true) option of the Reader classes... it's been part of PHPExcel for nearly 3 years now
WorkItem.Description:
Me thinks that the reason loading of large files falis is because of the memory used up by the styling attributes that need to be loaded. If an option to load the file with minimal style info is included, this would allow larger sheets to be opened because you don't have to cache style info. 
Â 
Any comments?
WorkItem.Summary: How about an option to load without any style info?
